vulnerabilities.title: Stimulsoft Dashboard.JS Cross Site Scripting vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Cross Site Scripting vulnerability in Stimulsoft GmbH Stimulsoft Dashboard.JS before v.2024.1.2 allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via a crafted payload to the ReportName field.

vulnerabilities.title: Stimulsoft Dashboard.JS Cross Site Scripting vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Cross Site Scripting vulnerability in Stimulsoft GmbH Stimulsoft Dashboard.JS before v.2024.1.2 allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via a crafted payload to the search bar component.

vulnerabilities.title: Stimulsoft Dashboard.JS directory traversal vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Directory Traversal vulnerability in Stimulsoft GmbH Stimulsoft Dashboard.JS before v.2024.1.3 allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via a crafted payload to the fileName parameter of the Save function.
